description:
Noa works as a waitress on Melemele Island where they serve Alola Pancakes as the specialty. She won the annual Pok√©mon Pancake Race the year before Ash arrived on the island. She was on the poster for the race and Ash recognized her and he asked her to teach him about the race.
She spent some time after lunch helping Ash and Pikachu learn the rules to the race. She then entered the race with her Raichu and ended up tying for second with Ash and Pikachu. She planned to enter the race again next year.
name: Noa
